name: Larry SHAW, Petitioner v. The DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA, the Attorney General of Pennsylvania, and the Superintendent of Scidallas, Respondents

parties: Larry SHAW, Petitioner v. The DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA, the Attorney General of Pennsylvania, and the Superintendent of Scidallas, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of January, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
107 A.3d 748
Larry SHAW, Petitioner v. The DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA, the Attorney General of Pennsylvania, and the Superintendent of Scidallas, Respondents.
No. 169 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 6, 2015.
